Description: Sherd of foot with concave edge of Attic black-glazed pottery cup (Vicup); glazed black on top and underside; scraped groove on upper surface of foot; reserved resting surface and outer face of foot with black band at top and bottom; incised ligature on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 523)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1664)
